table.searchString: `smspasscode-index` source="WinEventLog:SmsDB" EventCode="12003" | stats latest(Users_found) AS "Last users found", latest(Users_skipped) AS "Last users skipped", max(Users_found) AS "Max users found", max(Users_skipped) AS "Max users skipped", min(Users_found) AS "Min users found", min(Users_skipped) AS "Min users skipped" by Description
table.title: UIP(s)

table.searchString: `smspasscode-index` source="WinEventLog:SmsDB" (EventCode="3080" OR EventCode="3081") | eval BLHostType = DBBLhost."/".DBBLtype | table _time BLHostType EventCode | dedup BLHostType | replace 3081 with "Blacklisted" | replace 3080 with "OK" | rename BLHostType AS "Service", EventCode AS "Status"
table.title: Communication to Load balancing and Transmitter-service(s)
